original_text: And she hasted, and emptied her pitcher into the trough, and ran again unto the well to draw water, and drew for all his camels.
korean_text: 급히 물동이의 물을 구유에 붓고 다시 길으려고 우물로 달려가서 모든 낙타를 위하여 긷는지라

sentences.original_text: and emptied her pitcher into the trough
and ran again unto the well
and drew for all his camels
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 모든 낙타를 위해 물을 길었다
